DOC.brief_summary: This study propose construct ultrasound-based diagnostic model Differentiating Malignant Breast Lesion From Benign Lesion . This study contain retrospective prospective part , design model construction independent validation , respectively.This study aim construct easy-to-use ultrasound-based model , prove efficacy model identify malignant breast lesion benign lesion , finally promote application diagnostic model clinic .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound-based Diagnostic Model Differentiating Malignant Breast Lesion From Benign Lesion
DOC.criteria: female single breast lesion ( maximum diameter > 0.8 cm ) agree receive followup six month take second breast ultrasound six month first breast ultrasound , benign diagnosis achieve first ultrasound sign inform consent lose followup fail take second breast ultrasound six month first breast ultrasound
